status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
Currentrly I'm working with one app that will have a playlist, and so I would like to keep it playing on background and I though I would be able to use these controls.

I think would be really nice to have this feature native from appcelerator, so we would not need to use a module for this feature, wich I think is part of basic iOS features.


Module that does this: https://marketplace.appcelerator.com/apps/5573?651090353
fields.summary: Allow support for control center next/previous/pause buttons

comments.body: It's not about android, it's about *iOS*
